casebody.data:
James Patrick RYAN v. Harry C. TINSLEY, Warden of the Colorado State Penitentiary. No. 6162. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Sept. 18, 1959. Appeal from the United States District Court for the District of Colorado. John W. Patterson, Asst. Atty. Gen. of Colorado, for appellee.

Before BRATTON, PICKETT and LEWIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion, on the grounds stated in the trial court’s opinion, 182 F.Supp. 130.
